inclusion.criterion: Antipsychotic monotherapy with olanzapine, risperidone or quetiapine for minimum of 1 month at entry into study and with weight gain of 2 BMI units while on this medication
inclusion.label: not_met

inclusion.criterion: Antipsychotic monotherapy with aripiprazole is planned by the subject's treating psychiatrist
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Subjects able to fully participate in the informed consent process
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Female subjects of childbearing potential must be using a medically accepted means of contraception which includes tubal ligation, hysterectomy, condoms, oral contraceptives, intrauterine device (IUD), cervical cap, diaphragm, transdermal contraceptive patch, and abstinence
inclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Subjects have had a previous trial of aripiprazole
exclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Serious or unstable medical illness which requires ongoing treatment with medication
exclusion.label: met

notes: Patient has serious or unstable medical illness (CHF, dCHF) requiring ongoing treatment with medication.
